entry.value: INSERT INTO unity_demo.stg_api ( PartyDofbirth, PartyFname, PartyLname, PartyGender, PartyNationality, AddressCity, AddressPostcode, AddressState, AddressStreet, ContactEmail, ContactMobile, ContactPhone ) VALUES ( '${input.party_dofbirth}', '${input.party_fname}', '${input.party_lname}', '${input.party_gender}', '${input.party_nationality}', '${input.address_city}', '${input.address_postcode}', '${input.address_state}', '${input.address_street}', '${input.contact_email}', '${input.contact_mobile}', '${input.contact_phone}' );
